In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too: "There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly."
